ELEMENT.HTML:
The material on this site is adult oriented and/or sexually explicit, and is related to material of an adult nature. Access is made available only to those who accept the terms of the following agreement.

By accepting this agreement, I certify the following:
  1. I do not find images of nude adults, adults engaged in sexual acts, or other sexual material to be offensive or objectionable.
  2. I am at least 18 years of age and have the legal right to possess adult material in my community.
  3. I understand the standards and laws of the community, location and computer to which I am transporting this material, and am solely responsible for my actions.
  4. If I use these services in violation of the above agreement, I understand I may be in violation of local and/or federal laws and am solely responsible for my actions.
  5. By logging on, I will have released and discharged the providers, owners and creators of this site from any and all liability, which might arise.

WARNING: FOR ADULTS ONLY! This site contains explicit sexually oriented material. By entering this site you acknowledge that you are 18 years of age or older. All models featured are over the age of 18.

 Yes, I certify am an adult meeting the above criteria.
No, I do not wish to gain access to this site.
